Gina can introduce you to 11 people at Oracle

It takes two years in a row to become a tradition. So the Blackboard alumni after-party is back for year two during Educause.  And its bigger and better, marking the 20th anniversary of Bb after all.  Joining Matthew

Pittinsky (Parchment) this year as co-hosts are Steve Gilfus (SubjectMatter) and Chris Vento (Intellify Learning). So whether you are old school or still on the job, join us after all the private dinners and receptions are done for some food and drinks.  Below is the Evite, RSVP, hope to see you there.

summary: Parchment is energetically innovating credentials.  As a digital credential service we connect learners to P20 academic institutions and employers to issue, receive, and share credentials in simple and secure way.  Our platform has helped millions of people and thousands of schools and universities exchange more than 20 million transcripts and other credentials globally. Working at Parchment requires passion, drive and commitment. Our employees (see: Parchies) are willing to invest their talents to build and scale the first-ever digital credential service.  In doing so they are being innovative, creative, and having fun.If you want to Join Our Team and Unleash your inner A-Player....check us out:  http://www.parchment.com/careers/
name: Gina Heller
title: Director of HR for an Innovative, Creative, and Fun company, aka, Parchment.
